code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Note from"./Note";function CreateArea(props){const[area,setArea]=useState({title:"",content:""});function handleChange(event){console.log(setArea);const{name,value}=event.target;setArea(prevValue=>({...prevValue,[name]:value}));}function handleClick(event){props.addNote(area);setArea({title:"",content:""});event.preventDefault();}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{onChange:handleChange,name:"title",placeholder:"Title",value:area.title}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("textarea",{onChange:handleChange,name:"content",placeholder:"Take a note...",rows:"3",value:area.content}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:handleClick},"Add")));}export default CreateArea;
